CustomMetadata.label: Check for Known Carrier Data Mismatches

values.value: Check for Known Carrier Data Mismatches
Has this customer had any carrier data mismatches flagged by reconciliation audits within the last year?

Has this company had any issues flagged via Cases with subject containing ‘reconciliation audit’? Please provide a description of the issues including specific employee and plan names, the date the discrepancy was surfaced, and the record IDs where these issues were surfaced. The response should be brief but detailed
